statements: UPDATE AdvertisingCampaigns SET clicks = 100 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE AdvertisingCampaigns SET budget = 5000.00, conversions = 50 WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
UPDATE AdvertisingCampaigns SET budget = 5000.50, clicks = 1000 WHERE campaign_id = 101
UPDATE AdvertisingCampaigns SET conversions = 50, start_date = '2022-05-10', media_platform = 'Facebook' WHERE campaign_id = 102
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET impressions = 500, ad_cost = 1500.00 WHERE ad_id = 123;
UPDATE campaign_performance SET revenue = 2500.50, conversion_rate = 0.06 WHERE performance_id = 456;
UPDATE campaign_performance SET revenue = 500.75, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE performance_id = 12345 AND ad_id = 67890 AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET ad_cost = 2000.00, impressions = 1500, clicks = 100 WHERE ad_id = 67890 AND campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign';
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'New Campaign Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE clicks SET click_count = 50, timestamp = '2022-01-15' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE clicks SET click_count = 1000, timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET clicks = 500 WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ad_conversions SET revenue = 1500.00 WHERE conversion_id = '456e890f-23a1-4b32-9c12-8675309a9999';
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET clicks = clicks + 10, cost = cost - 1000 WHERE campaign_id = 'e4cc6931-8250-4785-b3d7-41cc3d5521b8';
UPDATE ad_conversions SET revenue = 1500.50 WHERE campaign_id = 'a7f35c28-9927-4aaf-ae1b-f7c4c775b3ce' AND platform_id = '65f3224c-1f6a-46d2-acd8-b4af41496226';

UPDATE ad_performance SET clicks = 500, conversions = 50, cost = 7500.50 WHERE performance_id = 3;
UPDATE advertising_campaigns SET budget = 15000.00, start_date = '2023-01-01', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_performance SET impressions = 50000, clicks = 2000, conversions = 100, cost = 2500.00 WHERE performance_id = 10;
